vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Jabez = "sorrow"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) the head of a Calebite family
n pr loc
2) a town in Judah apparently near Bethlehem
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ciudad; territorio de Judá; (b)   hombre; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅比斯 这个字在原文的意思是 "憂傷"
陽性專有名詞
1) 迦勒家的族長
專有名詞,地名
2) 靠近伯利恆猶大境內的一城鎮 (代上2:55)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅比斯 这个字在原文的意思是 "忧伤"
阳性专有名词
1) 迦勒家的族长
专有名词,地名
2) 靠近伯利恒犹大境内的一城镇 (代上2:55)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.4.9;
son of: Koz (H6976)(?);
brother of: Anub (H6036)(?), Zobebah (H6637)(?) and Harum (H2037)(?)
§ Jabez = "sorrow"
n pr m
1) the head of a Calebite family
n pr loc
2) a town in Judah apparently near Bethlehem
